channel.title: PDF server run error
channel.description:
hi guys
so i've download project dungeonfest (edit the ip's) in the client and now i go to the source and press run then i get this error: [code][2012/07/18 20:59:00] [Project DungeonFest]: Project DungeonFest framework [2012/07/18 20:59:00] [Project DungeonFest]: Loaded 15558item prices. [2012/07/18 20:59:00] [Project DungeonFest]: Loading Server GUI... [2012/07/18 20:59:01] [Project DungeonFest]: Reading mapdata... [2012/07/18 20:59:01] [Project DungeonFest]: Loaded mapdata. [2012/07/18 20:59:01] [Project DungeonFest]: Loaded packet handlers. [2012/07/18 20:59:01] [Project DungeonFest]: Loading item definitions... [2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: Loaded 12350 item definitions. [2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: Loading npc definitions... [2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: Loaded Project DungeonFest 305 npc definitions. [2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: Loading world list data... [2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: Setting up Project DungeonFest worl d... [2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: Loading clans.... [2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: Loaded 0 TkoScape clans. [2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters .ConversionException: Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor ---- Debugging information ---- message : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor cause-exception : com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ObjectAcces sException cause-message : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor class : java.util.ArrayList required-type : com.rs2hd.model.NPC path : /list/npc line number : 2 ------------------------------- [2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NP C as it does not have a no-args constructor : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.N PC as it does not have a no-args constructor ---- Debugging information ---- message : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor cause-exception : com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ObjectAcces sException cause-message : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor class : java.util.ArrayList required-type : com.rs2hd.model.NPC path : /list/npc line number : 2 ------------------------------- [2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeU nmarshaller.convert(TreeUnmarshaller.java:88) [2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.Abstr actReferenceUnmarshaller.convert(AbstractReferenceUnmarshaller.java:55) [2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeU nmarshaller.convertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:75) [2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeU nmarshaller.convertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:59) [2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters .collections.AbstractCollectionConverter.readItem(AbstractCollectionConverter.ja va:77) [2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters .collections.CollectionConverter.populateCollection(CollectionConverter.java:68)
[2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters .collections.CollectionConverter.unmarshal(CollectionConverter.java:61) [2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeU nmarshaller.convert(TreeUnmarshaller.java:81) [2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.Abstr actReferenceUnmarshaller.convert(AbstractReferenceUnmarshaller.java:55) [2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeU nmarshaller.convertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:75) [2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeU nmarshaller.convertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:59) [2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeU nmarshaller.start(TreeUnmarshaller.java:142) [2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.Abstr actTreeMarshallingStrategy.unmarshal(AbstractTreeMarshallingStrategy.java:33) [2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.un marshal(XStream.java:907) [2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.un marshal(XStream.java:893) [2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.fr omXML(XStream.java:845) [2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: com.rs2hd.model.World.setEngine(Wor ld.java:394) [2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: com.rs2hd.Server.<init>(Server.java :73) [2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: com.rs2hd.Main$1.run(Main.java:36) [2012/07/18 20:59:04] [Project DungeonFest]: java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source ) [/code]
anyone can resolve this problem if this problem is resolved the cache error wil fix too in the client?
thank you :D

item.title: PDF server run error
item.dc:creator: @JZombie37 JZombie37
item.description:
@JZombie37 wrote:

Jdk6_31
http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javaee/downloads/java-ee-sdk-6u3-jdk-6u29-downloads-523388.html

Read full topic

item.title: PDF server run error
item.dc:creator: @anti_man444 anti man444
item.description:
@anti_man444 wrote:

and where i can get java 6?
and jdk 6?

thank you

edit: got it

Read full topic

item.title: PDF server run error
item.dc:creator: @JZombie37 JZombie37
item.description:
@JZombie37 wrote:

Well the server run porblem is you need to use java 6 to run this server

Read full topic
